biography:
Jean Reno ( born July 30, 1948) is a French actor. Working in French, English, and Italian, he has appeared not only in numerous successful Hollywood productions such as The Pink Panther, Godzilla, The Da Vinci Code, Mission: Impossible, Ronin and Couples Retreat, but also in European productions such as the French films Les Visiteurs (1993) and LÃ©on (1994) along with the 2005 Italian film The Tiger and the Snow.
